attributes.action: Review the review board of the rugby football league rfl
attributes.additional_details: Sort out for tha national game of rugby league how it is run
attributes.background: To stop the biased rulings of the rfl and to stop it ruining the game

rejection.details: Any investigation or review into alleged bias by the Rugby Football League would be a matter for the Rugby Football League itself or a relevant organising body such as Sport England, not the UK Government or Parliament.
